column4: no!!! no!!! nooo.  all of that, and i'm still getting "802.11 wlan card support not enabled in kernel"
i would just like to take a moment to announce that wireless is evil. and i hate it. a lot.
god willing, i will figure out how to make it stop sucking in gusty, or tis back to xp with me  til feb :(
depends on which side of the houses wall you are on...
